decks.notes: This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures through creature tutoring cards like Chord of Calling to create different combo interactions that can disrupt the opponent's game plan. By utilizing creatures with abilities that benefit from sacrificing or entering the battlefield multiple times, the deck can generate incremental advantage and potentially win the game through a synergistic combination of creature abilities. The toolbox aspect of the deck allows for flexibility in finding the right creature for the situation, while also providing a mix of disruption and aggression to keep the opponent off balance.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the powerful interaction between Underworld Breach and various cards like Lotus Field, Hidden Strings, and Vizier of Tumbling Sands to generate a large amount of mana and repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard. This allows the player to set up a game-winning combo using Thassa's Oracle or The One Ring to either mill out the opponent or win through a massive power boost. The deck also includes several ways to dig through the library and find key pieces to assemble the combo quickly.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Shifting Woodland card to manipulate the board state and create powerful combos. By using card draw and denial spells, the player can set up a win condition using Omniscience and Karn, the Great Creator. LÃ³rien Revealed and Oracle of Tragedy help to dig for key pieces while Fallaji Archaeologist and Kiora, the Rising Tide provide additional support. With the ability to search for specific cards with Traverse the Ulvenwald, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combination of cards and synergies.
